original_title: Welcome to Da Block: Live from Philly: Vol. 1
overview: Freshly released from a Pennsylvania prison, Mike Braxton tours Philadelphia's underground rap scene, where he shines a spotlight on the city's hottest female rappers. The electrifying roster of MCs includes Lady Merk, Knockout, Ms. Aprop-8, Housewife, Last Donna, Poison Ivy, Young J, Turk, Ki-Mo, Unique, Muggs and Cassey. By the end, you'll wonder why they don't call Philly the city of "sisterly" love.
title: Welcome to Da Block: Live from Philly: Vol. 1
